item_category: Supercharge your visuals with TCL 20L. A cinematic 6.67-inch FHD+ Dotch display gives you the ultimate viewing experience with NXTVISION & HDR enhancement for incredible visuals. A 5000mAh battery with Smart Power Manager lets you use your phone freely all day and charge up instantly with fast on-the-go charging. Access what you need instantly and make the most of your multitasking using TCL 20L's 6GB RAM and Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 Octa-Core AI Engine. Capture any perspective, any time of day with a 48MP AI Quad-Camera with 2X lossless zoom.
review_title: Does what it says it does
review_text: Don't expect a Samsung or iphone experience but its a good phone for the price
Haven't had any problems, does everything I want and charges fast
